name: app/Cache.js
Cache
description: Interface to the {@link Storage} features that allows for storing and retrieving of objects by marshalling them.

name: isAvailable
description: Check if sessionStorage is available for use.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} availability - Whether or not caching features are available for use.

return.description: availability - Whether or not caching features are available for use.

name: store
description: Store an object in cache, will not do anything of Cache is not available.

params.name: key
params.description: The key for which the object can be retrieved.

params.name: object
params.description: The object to store.

name: has
description: Check if an object is stored under key.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} isStored - Whether or not the object is stored.

params.name: key
params.description: The key for which the object can be retrieved.

return.description: isStored - Whether or not the object is stored.

name: retrieve
description: Return the object stored.

unknown.tagValue: {?Object} object - The stored object, null if storage not available or not stored under key.

params.name: key
params.description: The key for which the object can be retrieved.

return.description: object - The stored object, null if storage not available or not stored under key.

name: remove
description: Remove the object at key, if it exists.

params.name: key
params.description: The key for which the object can be retrieved.

name: app/Speaker.js
speak
description: Performs the speech synthesis of the supplied parameters.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to be transformed to speech.

params.name: language
params.description: Language code to be used for synthesis.

name: app/config.js
content:
export default {
    /* These are all constants used in the UMR javascript. */
    ZEEGUU_SERVER: 'https://zeeguu.unibe.ch/api',
    ZEEGUU_SESSION: 'sessionID',
    RECOMMENDED_FEED_ENDPOINT: '/interesting_feeds',
    FOLLOW_FEED_ENDPOINT: '/start_following_feed_with_id',
    UNFOLLOW_FEED_ENDPOINT: '/stop_following_feed',
    GET_TRANSLATIONS_ENDPOINT: '/get_possible_translations',
    GET_FEEDS_BEING_FOLLOWED: '/get_feeds_being_followed',
    GET_FEED_ITEMS: '/get_feed_items_with_metrics',
    GET_AVAILABLE_LANGUAGES: '/available_languages',
    TO_LANGUAGE: 'en',
    HTML_ZEEGUUTAG: 'ZEEGUU',
    HTML_ORIGINAL: 'orig',
    HTML_TRANSLATED: 'tran',
    HTML_ATTRIBUTE_TRANSCOUNT: 'transCount',
    HTML_ATTRIBUTE_TRANSLATION: 'translation',
    HTML_ID_ARTICLE_URL: '#articleURL',
    HTML_ID_ARTICLE_TITLE: '#articleTitle',
    HTML_ID_TOGGLETRANSLATE: '#toggle_translate',
    HTML_ID_ALTERMENU: '#alterMenu',
    HTML_ID_ALTERMENUCONTAINER: '#alterMenuContainer',
    HTML_ID_ARTICLELINK_TEMPLATE: '#articleLink-template',
    HTML_ID_ARTICLELINK_LIST: '#articleLinkList',
    HTML_ID_SUBSCRIPTION_TEMPLATE: '#subscription-template',
    HTML_ID_SUBSCRIPTION_LIST: "#subscriptionList",
    HTML_ID_ADDSUBSCRIPTION_TEMPLATE: '#feedAddable-template',
    HTML_ID_ADDSUBSCRIPTION_LIST: '#addableFeedList',
    HTML_ID_LANGUAGEOPTION_TEMPLATE: '#languageOption-template',
    HTML_CLASS_LOADER: '.loader',
    HTML_CLASS_EMPTY_PAGE: '.emptyPage'
};

name: app/subscription/ArticleList.js
ArticleList
description: Manages a list of article links, stores them in {@link Cache} if possible.

name: load
description:
Call zeeguu and get the articles for the given feed 'subscription'.
If the articles are already in {@link Cache}, load them instead.
Uses {@link ZeeguuRequests}.

params.name: subscription
params.description: The feed to retrieve articles from.

name: clear
description: Remove all articles from the list, clears the cached articles.

name: remove
description: Remove all articles from the list associated with the given feed.

params.name: feedID
params.description: The identification code associated with the feed.

name: _loadArticleLinks
description:
Store all the article links from a particular feed if possible, makes sure they are rendered.
Callback function for the zeeguu request.

params.name: subscription
params.description: The feed the articles are from.

params.name: articleLinks
params.description: List containing the articles for the feed.

name: _renderArticleLinks
description: Generate all the article links from a particular feed.

params.name: subscription
params.description: The feed the articles are from.

params.name: articleLinks
params.description: List containing the articles for the feed.

name: app/subscription/FeedSubscriber.js
FeedSubscriber
description: Allows the user to add feed subscriptions.

name: constructor
description: Link the {@link SubscriptionList} with this instance so we can update it on change.

params.name: subscriptionList
params.description: Local (!) list of currently subscribed-to feeds.

name: load
description:
Call Zeeguu and requests recommended feeds for the given language.
If the language is not given, it simply uses the last used language.
Uses {@link ZeeguuRequests}.

params.name: language
params.description: Language code.

name: clear
description: Clear the list of feed options.

name: getCurrentLanguage
description: Return the language for the feed options currently displayed.

return.description: The language of feed options currently on display.

name: _loadFeedOptions
description:
Fills the dialog's list with all the addable feeds.
Callback function for zeeguu.

params.name: data
params.description: A list of feeds the user can subscribe to.

name: _follow
description:
Subscribe to a new feed, calls the zeeguu server.
Uses {@link ZeeguuRequests}.

params.name: feed
params.description: Document element containing the id of the feed.

name: _onFeedFollowed
description:
A feed has just been followed, so we refresh the {@link SubscriptionList} and remove the
mentioned feed from the addable feed list.
Callback function for Zeeguu.

params.name: feed
params.description: Document element containing the id of the feed.

params.name: data
params.description: Reply from the server.

name: app/subscription/LanguageMenu.js
LanguageMenu
description:
Retrieves the available languages of Zeeguu and fills
the {@link FeedSubscriber}'s dialog with these options.

name: constructor
description: Link the {@link FeedSubscriber} to this instance.

params.name: feedSubscriber
params.description: List of non-subscribed feeds to update.

name: load
description:
Load the available languages for the dialog.
Uses {@link ZeeguuRequests}.

name: _loadLanguageOptions
description:
Generates all the available language options as buttons in the dialog.
Callback function from the zeeguu request.

params.name: data
params.description: JSON string of an array of language codes.

name: app/subscription/SubscriptionList.js
SubscriptionList
description:
Shows a list of all subscribed feeds, allows the user to remove them.
It updates the {@link ArticleList} accordingly.

name: constructor
description: Bind with the {@link ArticleList} and initialise an empty list of feeds.

params.name: articleList
params.description: List of all articles available to the user.

name: load
description:
Call zeeguu and retrieve all currently subscribed feeds.
 Uses {@link ZeeguuRequests}.

name: clear
description: Remove all feeds from the list, clear {@link ArticleList} as well.

name: refresh
description: Call clear and load successively.

name: _loadSubscriptions
description:
Fills the subscription list with all the subscribed feeds.
Callback function for the zeeguu request,
makes a call to {@link ArticleList} in order to load the feed's associated articles.

params.name: data
params.description: List containing the feeds the user is subscribed to.

name: _unfollow
description:
Un-subscribe from a feed, call the zeeguu server.
Uses {@link ZeeguuRequests}.

params.name: feed
params.description: Feed element of the list to un-subscribe from.

name: _onFeedUnfollowed
description:
A feed has just been removed, so we remove the mentioned feed from the subscription list.
Callback function for zeeguu.

params.name: feed
params.description: Feed element of the list that is to be removed.

params.name: data
params.description: Server reply.

name: _remove
description:
Remove a mentioned feed from the local list (not from the zeeguu list).
Makes sure the associated articles are removed as well by notifying {@link ArticleList}.

params.name: feedNode
params.description: The document element (feed) to remove.

name: app/subscription/main.js
app/translation/AlterMenu.js
AlterMenu
description:
Class that allows for choosing alternative zeeguu translations from
a drop-down alter menu.

name: constructor
description:
Initialize the notifier field and the control field for the state of the
alter menu (i.e. open or closed).

name: constructAndOpen
description: Create and open the alternative translation menu.

params.name: htmlTag
params.description: Document element for which to present the alter menu.

name: construct
description:
Add buttons with click listeners that replace the translation and
append these to the alter menu.

params.name: zeeguuTag
params.description: Tag from which the alternative transaltions are retrieved.

params.name: transCount
params.description: Number of present alternative translations.

name: _swapPrimaryTranslation
description: Swap the currently set translation (config.HTML_ATTRIBUTE_TRANSLATION 0) with the selected alternative.

params.name: selectedAlternative
params.description: Attribute that determines the selected alternative.

name: _place
description: Place the alter menu below the supplied zeeguuTag.

params.name: zeeguuTag
params.description: Reference tag for the placement of the alter menu.

name: reposition
description: Update the position of the alter menu.

name: close
description: Hide the alter menu.

name: isOpen
description: Check whether the alter menu is an open state.

return.description: True only if the alter menu is open.

name: app/translation/Notifier.js
Notifier
description:
Presents small pop-up messages (notifications).
Does not repeat the same message if it currently displays it.

name: constructor
description: Initializes the previously displayed message field. Empty at creation.

name: notify
description: Notify the user with the supplied message.

params.name: message
params.description: Message to be displayed.

name: app/translation/Translator.js
Translator
description: Class that allows for translating zeeguu tags.

name: translate
description:
Merge the surrounding translated zeeguuTags
and insert translations for the tag's content by calling Zeeguu.
Uses {@link ZeeguuRequests}.

params.name: zeeguuTag
params.description: Document element containing the content to be translated.

name: isTranslated
description: Checks whether given zeeguuTag is already translated.

params.name: zeeguuTag
params.description: Document element that wraps translatable content.

return.description: True only if the passed zeeguuTag already has translation data.

name: _setTranslations
description: Handle the Zeeguu request returned values. Append the returned translations.

params.name: htmlTag
params.description: Document element processed for translation.

params.name: translations
params.description: A list of translations to be added to the given htmlTag content.

name: _getContext
description:
Returns surrounding textual context for a given zeeguuTag by extracting the text from 
its wrapping parent element.

params.name: zeeguuTag
params.description: Document element for which to extract textual context

name: _mergeZeeguu
description: Merge the translated zeeguuTags surrounding the given zeeguuTag.

params.name: zeeguuTag
params.description: Tag for which to perform merge with the surrounding tags.

name: app/translation/main.js
app/zeeguuRequests.js
ZeeguuRequests
description: Abstracts request to the Zeeguu API.

name: session
description: Retrieve the Zeeguu sessionID.

unknown.tagValue: {?string} session - The session ID of the user, if present.

return.description: session - The session ID of the user, if present.

name: _readCookie
description: Read a cookie, search for the attribute of a particular name and retrieve it.

unknown.tagValue: {?string} session - The session ID of the user, if present.

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the attribute.

return.description: session - The session ID of the user, if present.

name: get
description: Send a GET request to the Zeeguu API.

params.name: endpoint
params.description: The endpoint to use.

params.name: requestData
params.description: Parameters to append.

params.name: responseHandler
params.description: A function that can asynchronously handle the reply.

name: post
description: Send a POST request to the Zeeguu API.

params.name: endpoint
params.description: The endpoint to use.

params.name: requestData
params.description: Parameters to append.

params.name: responseHandler
params.description: A function that can asynchronously handle the reply.
